name: Snowplow Transformation
shortDescription: Transform raw Snowplow data to Quix format
longDescription:
Transform raw Snowplow data to Quix format
Deploy the Amazon Kinesis connector to stream data from Snowplow, then deploy this to convert it to Quix format

Variables.Name: input
Variables.Description: This is the input topic for raw data

Variables.Name: output
Variables.Description: This is the output topic for the converted stream
